title: (New Champion Suggestion) Mervin the Fluffy Duke
body:
Appearance(open for comments): Mervin is seen as a well bred majestic ram with a monocle on his left eye, he attacks with his horns, His appearance changes throughout the game(seen below) from fully shorn progressively gaining more wool. 
Lore: Mervin comes from high class breed of sheep and as so he rarely speaks to the commoners that the league is filled of. He is very aggressive towards other animals and has come to the league to get his fill of there blood.
Kit:
Passive: Gain Wool: As Mervin kills monsters and animal like champions, he gains stack/s of wool (champions, dragon and baron grant 5 wool, assists small and large monsters grant 1)(capped eat 50 wool) Each wool grants 1 attack damage and Mervin's skills have bonus effects at 35 stacks of wool.
Skill 1 (Q): Baa! : Mervin shouts a mighty roar inflicting damage(60/100/140/180/220)+( %Attack damage)  in a cone if front of him. Once Mervin has 35+ stacks of wool his baa! becomes even mightier and now champions, monsters(excluding dragon and baron) and minions are too afraid to face him for (0.5/0.75/1/1.25/1.5) seconds forcing them to either stay still or run away from the beast.
Mana:50/60/65/70/75   Cool down: 12/11/10/9/8
Skill 2 (W): Ram! : Mervin gains bonus movement increasing(fairly quickly) to (50/60/70/80/100) for 4 seconds but can only move in a straight line if he hits a champion knocks them up for 1 sec dealing (55/80/95/110/125)+(50% bonus attack damage) -(75/100/125/150/175)+(75% bonus attack damage), he is stoped by walls. Once Mervin has 35+ stacks of wool Mervin will lock onto nearby champs and start moving towards them in a straight line. 
Mana: 60/70/80/90/100 Cool down:20/17/15/13/11
Skill 3 (E) Ewe! : Selects a champion or large/epic monster and takes (10/15/20/25/30)% reduced damage from them and deal (10-15-20-25-30)+(10% bonus attack damage) bonus magic damage to them for 5 seconds. Once Mervin has 35+ stacks of wool the bonus damage is now true damage.
Mana: 70  Cool down: 20/17/15/13/11
Skill 4 (R) Dukes rampage: (Passive) When Mervin takes 35% of his maximum health in the space of 7 seconds he goes into a rampage gaining (35/50/65)% attack speed and (10-15-25)% life steal for 3 seconds. Cannot be used more then once in the space of 40 seconds.  
(Active) Mervin pride forces Mervin to display his beautiful form by turning his wool pink. Once Mervin has 35+ stacks of wool the wool becomes the shiniest and most handsome coat of pink in the whole of the league.
Mana: 1/2/3   Cooldown: 100
 
Base Stats:
Attack damage: 55+ 3.5 per level (PL)
Armor: 25+ 3.5 PL
Attack speed: 0.65+ 2.5% PL
Magic resist: 32+ 1.25 PL
Movement speed: 340
Health: 590+85 PL
Mana: 300+50 PL
Health regen: 10 + 0.9 PL 
Mana regen: 7+ 0.7 PL
Attack range: 125

Thanks for reading bare in mind I am very bad at balancing please post any improvements/ criticisms especially on wording because I'm dyslexic/bad at English. I tried to be the most original and creative I could in the moves/ kit but the scales and base stats are pretty much a copy of vi.
Hope you like the Duke of Woolsberg.
